name: Napa (Paracetamol)
description: Effective for reducing fever and mild to moderate pain.

name: Seclo (Omeprazole)
description: Used to treat gastric ulcers and acid reflux.

name: Azee (Azithromycin)
description: Antibiotic effective against bacterial infections.

name: Maxpro (Esomeprazole)
description: Reduces stomach acid, treating GERD and ulcers.

name: Montedoc (Montelukast)
description: Used for asthma and allergy management.

name: Pantose (Pantoprazole)
description: Treats acid reflux and prevents stomach ulcers.

name: Neuro-B (Vitamin B Complex)
description: Vitamin B complex for nerve health and energy.

name: Furoclav (Cefuroxime + Clavulanic Acid)
description: Broad-spectrum antibiotic effective for infections.

name: Zimax (Azithromycin)
description: Treats respiratory and urinary tract infections.

name: Insulatard (Insulin)
description: Insulin injection for type 1 and type 2 diabetes.

name: Losectil (Omeprazole)
description: Relieves symptoms of acid reflux and ulcers.

name: Aristovit-B (Multivitamins)
description: Boosts energy and supports overall health.

name: Norflox (Norfloxacin)
description: Effective against urinary tract infections.

name: Metformin
description: Helps control blood sugar in type 2 diabetes.

name: Zincovit (Zinc + Vitamins)
description: Supports immunity and overall health.

name: Cefolac (Cefixime)
description: Third-generation cephalosporin antibiotic.

name: Loratadine
description: Non-drowsy antihistamine for allergy symptoms.

name: Cough Syrup (Ambroxol)
description: Relieves cough and congestion.

name: Zolium (Esomeprazole)
description: Treats acid reflux and stomach ulcers.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Common antibiotic used for various infections.

name: Dexpoten (Dexamethasone)
description: Used to reduce inflammation and treat autoimmune diseases.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Helps lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels.

name: Claritek (Clarithromycin)
description: Effective for respiratory tract infections.

name: Losartan
description: Used to treat high blood pressure.

name: Duloxetine
description: Used for depression, anxiety, and nerve pain.

name: Omix (Omeprazole)
description: Relieves heartburn and acid reflux.

name: Sultolin (Salbutamol Inhaler)
description: Inhaler for asthma and COPD patients.

name: Clozepam (Clonazepam)
description: Used for anxiety and seizure disorders.

name: Amaryl (Glimepiride)
description: Oral diabetes medicine for blood sugar control.

name: Zovirax (Acyclovir)
description: Used for treating herpes and chickenpox.
